title: Cant aim my spells
body: When in game I cant use my mouse to aim a ability it stays in one place how can I change this?

replies.body:
Depending on the hardware/software of your mouse, it may be negatively interacting with League of Legends.  If you haven't tried to directly edit the input files on the League of Legends installation, make sure to complete the steps in our [Mouse Issues Article](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761934).  The steps there should get your mouse working normally again!

Feel free to give me a heads up if you are still experiencing any issues!
